topics.body:
How could you not love Yo-kai watch.

There's a ghost that's really flaming.

A Cat Spirit that spends his time trying to beat the shit out of cars.

A dog with the head of a washed up middle aged salaryman.

And a lot of Spirits that influence people in weird ways. (Like there's this one that makes people amazed about everything)
